Job Title: Senior Accountant (Remote / Flexible)

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Insulet started in 2000 with an idea and a mission to enable our customers to enjoy simplicity, freedom and healthier lives through the use of our Omnipod® product platform. In the last two decades we have improved the lives of hundreds of thousands of patients by using innovative technology that is wearable, waterproof, and lifestyle accommodating.

We are looking for highly motivated, performance driven individuals to be a part of our expanding team. We do this by hiring amazing people guided by shared values who exceed customer expectations. Our continued success depends on it!

Job Title: Senior Accountant

Department:  8200 – Finance Controller

Manager/Supervisor:  Manager, Corporate Accounting

FLSA Status:  Exempt

SOP Group: Finance/Accounting

Position Overview

The Senior Accountant will be responsible for the monthly, quarterly, and annual accounting processes related to debt, leases, and sales and marketing expenses, including the preparation of journal entries and account reconciliations, as well as fluctuation analyses.

Responsibilities

Support monthly close and internal reporting process by preparing journal entries and account reconciliations for debt, leases, and accrued sales and marketing expensesAssist in ensuring that financial statements are in compliance with US GAAPAnalyze monthly and quarterly fluctuations in accounts associated with areas of responsibilityAssist with completion of internal controls associated with areas of responsibilityDevelop and implement accounting procedures by analyzing current procedures and recommending changesProvide support to General Accounting group with operational analysis as related to recurring transactions and the monthly account reconciliation processProvide support for accounting for new business initiativesAssist with various projects and accounting matters and drive value within the businessPerforms other duties as required

Education And Experience

Minimum Requirements:

Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting, MSA / MBA a plus3-4 years of public accounting and / or corporate experience at SEC registered entities

Preferred Skills

Preferred Skills and Competencies: 

Proficiency with MS Windows and MS Office Software, especially ExcelExcellent communication and analytical skillsDeadline oriented with attention to detailExcellent organizational skillsAbility to handle multiple projectsTeam player and collaborativeExperience with SAP a plus

NOTE: This position is eligible for 100% remote working arrangements (may work from home/virtually 100%; may also work hybrid on-site/virtual as desired).    

Additional Information

The US base salary range for this full-time position is $74,200.00 - $111,550.00. Our salary ranges are determined by role, level, and location. The range displayed on each job posting reflects the minimum and maximum target for new hire salaries for the position in the primary work location in the US. Within the range, individual pay is determined by work location and additional factors, including job-related skills, experience, and relevant education or training. Your Talent Acquisition Specialist can share more about the specific salary range for your preferred location during the hiring process. Please note that the compensation details listed in US role postings reflect the base salary only, and do not include bonus, equity, or benefits.

At Insulet Corporation all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteran.

(Know Your Rights)

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
